Package javax.rmi

Contains user APIs for RMI-IIOP.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
PortableRemoteObject Server implementation objects may either inherit from javax.rmi.PortableRemoteObject or they may implement a remote interface and then use the exportObject method to register themselves as a server object.
 

Package javax.rmi Description

Contains user APIs for RMI-IIOP. These APIs are provided for use by RMI-IIOP applications, and provide equivalent semantics when running over either IIOP or JRMP. See also the javax.rmi.CORBA package.
